Some of the most common procedures and analsyes in both GIS and GCD are elaborated in these video tutorials. The tutorials act as a reference for the exercises used in the GCD Workshop, taught at Utah State University.

  • 02. Building DEMs

  • 03. Simple DoD in Raster Calculator
